archimate:Requirement.name: PE-3(3): Physical Access Control | Continuous Guards
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Employ guards to control [Assignment: organization-defined physical access points] to the facility where the system resides 24 hours per day, 7 days per week.

properties.value: Employing guards at selected physical access points to the facility provides a more rapid response capability for organizations. Guards also provide the opportunity for human surveillance in areas of the facility not covered by video surveillance.
